title: Indian Hotels company to bring in Vivanta and Ginger Hotels in Hosur
description: The Indian Hotels Company Ltd plans to introduce two new hotels in Hosur, Tamil Nadu. The projects include a 150-room Vivanta and a 200-room Ginger hotel. These developments aim to cater to the growing demand for corporate travel and events in the region, driven by economic growth and infrastructural development.
